# Metrics

This document enumerates the metrics collected by this project using the [Glean SDK](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/index.html).
This project may depend on other projects which also collect metrics.
This means you might have to go searching through the dependency tree to get a full picture of everything collected by this project.

# Pings

- [ballot-interaction](#ballot-interaction)
- [deletion-request](#deletion-request)
- [events](#events)
- [modal-interaction](#modal-interaction)
- [notice-interaction](#notice-interaction)
- [online-service-navigation](#online-service-navigation)
- [serp-visit](#serp-visit)
- [study-enrollment](#study-enrollment)
- [study-initialization](#study-initialization)

## ballot-interaction

This ping is sent for users in the search engine ballot treatment group
once they've made a selection, or if they have refused to make a
selection three times.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ballot_interaction.attempt_details |[event](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/event.html) |Details for each of the ballot attempts.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>attempt_number: What number attempt this was. </li><li>attention_duration: How long the presentation of the ballot had the user's attention. </li><li>details_expanded: The names of search engines on the ballot for which the participant expanded details (only relevant in Condition 5). </li><li>dwell_time: How long the presentation of the ballot was open. </li><li>see_more_selected: If the user clicked the “See More Search Engines” button (only relevant in Condition 7). </li><li>treatment_time: The time that the ballot was presented to the participant. </li></ul>|never | |
| ballot_interaction.attempts |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of times that a choice ballot was presented to the participant. If a selection is not made after 3 attempts, the ballot is not shown again.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: attempts</li></ul>|never | |
| ballot_interaction.ballot_ordering |[string_list](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string_list.html) |The ordering of the search engines on the ballot.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| ballot_interaction.new_search_engine |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The search engine that the participant selected and the default was changed to.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| ballot_interaction.old_search_engine |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The participant's default search engine in web browser settings, before the treatment was applied.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| ballot_interaction.ping_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the data submission ping was generated.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| ballot_interaction.treatment_completion_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the treatment was completed.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## deletion-request

This is a built-in ping that is assembled out of the box by the Glean SDK.

See the Glean SDK documentation for the [`deletion-request` ping](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/deletion-request.html).

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## modal-interaction

This ping is sent for users in the modal treatment group once the user
interacts with the modal.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| modal_interaction.ping_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the data submission ping was generated.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| modal_interaction.revert_selected |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether the participant chose to revert the search engine change.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## notice-interaction

This ping is sent after completion of the default condition treatment.
We consider the treatment to be complete when the participant closes the
default change notice, either by closing the notice window with the menu
bar X, clicking on the “Close” button, clicking on the “Revert” button if
it is present, or exiting the browser.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| notice_interaction.attention_duration |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long the treatment notice had the participant's attention.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| notice_interaction.dwell_time |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long the treatment notice was open.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| notice_interaction.new_search_engine |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The search engine that the default was changed to.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| notice_interaction.old_search_engine |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The participant's default search engine in web browser settings, before the treatment was applied.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| notice_interaction.ping_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the data submission ping was generated.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| notice_interaction.revert_selected |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether the participant selected the revert button.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| notice_interaction.treatment_completion_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the treatment was completed.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| notice_interaction.treatment_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the treatment was applied.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## online-service-navigation

This ping is sent on around a daily basis and contains details
about participant navigation to the tracked online services.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| online_service_navigation.aggregation_period_start_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The start time of the current aggregation period.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| online_service_navigation.online_service_data |[event](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/event.html) |Accumulated participant navigation data for each of the tracked Google services and online services.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>attention_time: Total attention time during the current aggregation period. </li><li>completed_transaction_count: Count of transactions completed during the current aggregation period. </li><li>dwell_time: Total dwell time during the current aggregation period. </li><li>page_visit_count: Count of pages visited during the current aggregation period. </li><li>service_name: The name of the service. </li></ul>|never | |
| online_service_navigation.ping_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the data submission ping was generated.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## serp-visit

This ping is sent when there is a visit to a search engine results page.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.attention_duration |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long the SERP had the participant's attention.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.attribution |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |How the user navigated to the search engine.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.attribution_id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |A randomly generated unique ID that associates related SERPs.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.current_default_engine |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The participant's default search engine at the time of the SERP visit.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.dwell_time |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |How long the SERP was open in the participant's browser.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: milliseconds</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.google_results_num |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of results produced for the query by Google.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: results</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.modification_type |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The type of modification that the study attempted to make to the self-preferenced results on the search engine response page (None, Removal, Replacement).  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.navigational_query |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |If the search query was a navigational query to one of the tracked online services or Google services, then this will be the category of the online service it was for.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.num_ad_clicks |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of advertisements that the participant clicked on.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: clicks</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.num_ads |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of advertisements on the page.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: pages</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.num_internal_clicks |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of result links that the participant clicks and that lead to another page operated by the same company as the search engine.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: clicks</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.num_self_preferenced_clicks |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The number of selections of links in the self-preferenced results.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: clicks</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.organic_clicks |[event](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/event.html) |Details for each selection of an organic result on the SERP.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>attention_duration_upon_click: The attention duration when the selection occurred. </li><li>page_loaded_upon_selection: Whether the SERP completed loading when the selection occurred. </li><li>result_ranking: The ranking of the selected organic result. </li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.organic_details |[event](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/event.html) |Details for each of the organic results on the SERP.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>result_bottom_height: The number of pixels between the top of the page and the bottom of the organic result. </li><li>result_online_service: The online service of the result only if the result is for one of the tracked online services. </li><li>result_page_num: The page number that the organic result was on (only collected for DuckDuckGo SERPs, because they present results as one continuously scrolling page) </li><li>result_top_height: The number of pixels between the top of the page and the top of the organic result. </li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.page_loaded |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Whether the SERP completed loading in the participant's browser.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.page_number |[quantity](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/quantity.html) |The page number of the results for the query.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)|<ul><li>unit: page</li></ul>|never | |
| serp_visit.page_visit_start_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The timestamp the SERP visit started rounded down to the nearest hour.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |
| serp_visit.ping_time |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time that the data submission ping was generated.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## study-enrollment

This ping is sent when the user has consented to the study.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| rally.id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |The id of the Rally client. This is generated by the Rally SDKs. A value of 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 indicates a test payload. A value of 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111 indicates that the Rally id was not found or properly set.  |[Review 1](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0)||never | |

## study-initialization

This ping is sent when the study first loads in the participant's
web browser.


**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TDfq3wwX2lPgCPVnksWaMtvEKiPCNuAQxITfob38Ga0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1748721>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.
